title: What are nicknames for Louisiana? - Quora

response.answer_text: We used to call it “L A” because that’s the abbreviation— and when I moved to California it confused the heck out of me when people would talk about “L.A.”…Certain sausages are called LA Hots, and it’s not a reference to Los Angeles… Some people pronounce the state name “Loozyanna” but we only said it that way as a joke, thinking that it was low-class and slang. But parts of the state still say it that way… You see Pelican State or Bayou State on a ton of license plates.

Louisiana Nicknames Pelican StateBayou StateChild of the MississippiThe Creole StateThe Mardi Gras StateThe Cajun StateJazz capital of the USBayou CountryCajun CountrySportsman's ParadiseFisherman's ParadiseThe Holland of AmericaSugar State
